name: Anna Wendt
biography: Anna Wendt is a graduate of the Stella Adler Academy of Acting, Los Angeles. This was a rich and rewarding experience that included character development, script analysis, classical acting, movement, dialect and improv.She has appeared in various roles in television, film and stage in contemporary and classic productions in L.A. and Las Vegas.Anna is the owner and author of "Hollywood Underdog" which is an entertainment and lifestyle blog.She is also a host and presenter for live events and was a national spokesperson for XM Satellite Radio for several years.::Hollingsworth
